summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.0°C) and feels like temperature (down 1.5°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 658 m), light levels (up 3904 lux), and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1608 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 5903 lux) when compared to today.

Today’s average cloud levels is 658.3m lower than yesterday, 544.1m lower than the past week, 1607.6m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 1059m to a maximum of 3380m, averaging 1065.9m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1610.0m and 2670m respectively.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky and calm and still conditions are expected. A few light raindrops may fall, clouds will occasionally block sunlight, and moderate levels of sunlight will be present. Changeable conditions.
